mean_en: a cream, jelly or liquid that you put on your hair or skin to make it look better; a thing that is grown or produced, usually for sale; a thing produced during a natural, chemical or industrial process
sentence: These products are made of milk.
sentence_trans: 这些产品都是由牛奶制成的。
word_etyma: pro向前 + duct引导，带来 → 引出的东西 → product产物，产品
